TopicTitle: The Rocket Printing Hype Train Thread

Articles.Content: Kerbal soft toys is my guess.

I imagine it's something like Kerbal Toys of some variety.

Though something like Tweakscale going stock is another thought I had.
They should sell a line of Kerbal Snacks. Yum!
Virtual 3d is not 3dÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ I'm thinking 3d (toys or something). Fits another dimension.

[https://twitter.com/Maxmaps/status/570110121545576448](https://twitter.com/Maxmaps/status/570110121545576448)

Looks like nobody guessed correctly yet...
Lego?

I love this community ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) One small sentence from a dev, that says nothing concrete to boot...and forum goes bananas with wild speculations. Chill, you guys. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

> 
> I love this community ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) One small sentence from a dev, that says nothing concrete to boot...and forum goes bananas with wild speculations. Chill, you guys. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

Darn it, we are Kerbals, we don't know the meaning of chill! ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
Wonder if the thread regarding 3d printing of ships has something to do with this? Seems to fit the bill, even if in idea only.

My second guess is the adding of 2D blue prints like Kronal Vessel Viewer.

Although I'm hopeing Kerbals becoming a 2D green shape when lithobraking, not on their heads.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-24T09:45:22Z" title="02/24/2015 09:45  AM" data-short="9 yr">February 24, 2015</time> by bonyetty**

^ I think you've got it: 

Different dimension = 2d diagrams

It's related to -your- ingame creations. = Kronal Vessel Viewer is applied to your own ships.
I'm still betting on SpaceX official parts.

> 
> You're right. Like how they talked about dV numbers in the last devnote after posting it on... I don't even remember where now.
> Oh wait they didn't talk about it in the devnote.
> 
> Anyway, I assume this is what you guessed, though that's not a "new" dimension. It's the current number of dimensions minus 1. If I came out to my car and saw it only had 3 tires I wouldn't say "Oh wow a new tire!"

I know but we're talking about Maxmap's puns. Anyway it's probably 3D printed rockets.

Hey guys?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-24T16:41:58Z" title="02/24/2015 04:41  PM" data-short="9 yr">February 24, 2015</time> by AngusJimiKeith**
Stock Soyuz?

> 
> Stock Soyuz?

oohhh, maybe a stock, 1.875 meter 2-man soyuz-style pod

-snip-

> 
> Ok, but even if Max's announcement is something minor, *something* is happening. I've been suspecting it since they announced 1.0 with only one beta release...

We already know that Squad want the game in more outlets than just Steam and their own website. Designating the game as a full release may well be motivated by that.

> 
> heh.. i think some folks are overthinking this. I mean not to long ago they had the partnership with NASA for 23.5 and the asteroid redirect mission

Now that's a fair point. I suppose a good reasonable scenario is a partnership with another space company. SpaceX is obvious given Elon Musk has complimented the game, but there are others. (Virgin Galactic, and we get new hybrid rockets and swing-wing parts? Well, a guy can dream.)
-snip-

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-24T16:04:08Z" title="02/24/2015 04:04  PM" data-short="9 yr">February 24, 2015</time> by KasperVld**
I'll say Roscosmos parts then as well ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

If it's related to our creations, I guess parts do that, so I'll bet on new parts (and maybe a scenario?)

What came to mind just from the first tweet was something with Space-X, where we get some kind of parts based on the Falcon 9 or Dragon, since they've come up a lot recently.

If it's stock Russian/Soviet parts, that would be incredibly useful, especially if they are Soyuz based.

Given the talk of different dimensions that I'm overlooking, there's probably a large degree of wishful thinking on my part in this prediction.

Re: Russian parts

It couldn't possibly be that. That would be *really* cool, and they almost never hit the '*really* cool' mark. Often they'll hit the 'cool' mark..but not '*really* cool'.

Or really hot or really bomb or really sick or whatever kids say today. Get off my lawn!

> 
> It's confirmed.
> http://thrustwolf.deviantart.com/art/Concept-Craft-6-Minecraft-Space-Program-305053548[http://fc00.deviantart.net/fs71/i/2012/150/9/e/concept_craft__6___minecraft_space_program_by_thrustwolf-d51mcto.jpg](http://fc00.deviantart.net/fs71/i/2012/150/9/e/concept_craft__6___minecraft_space_program_by_thrustwolf-d51mcto.jpg)
> 
> They've partnered with Mojang.
> 
> Prepare for **war**.

That would mean partnering with Microsoft. I highly doubt that.

> 
> KSP console exclusive on PS4.

What, for console peasants? Pfff... ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

How could they even do anything in VAB?

How about Kerbalizer integration? That would be about time, for 1.0 release!

Customize your kerbals, in kerbal!

edit: forget it, its about partnerships.. but still, Kerbalizer integration would be about time ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-24T13:26:26Z" title="02/24/2015 01:26  PM" data-short="9 yr">February 24, 2015</time> by Martijn404**
Please let it be Russian parts! ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

OK chaps, a little update,

 [https://twitter.com/Maxmaps/status/570110121545576448](https://twitter.com/Maxmaps/status/570110121545576448)

He says it's "related to -your- ingame creations".

Oh, and nobody on reddit has guessed correctly yet.
